Begin Mini-Page 21130
Weddings & Events
The event spaces at Fort Lauderdale Country Club are able to cater to a variety of event
sizes.
Whether you are having a large celebration, corporate meeting or
intimate gathering, our event staff is pleased to accommodate your needs.
Large and small events, Weddings, Anniversaries, Charity events, Birthday celebrations, Retirement parties, Family gatherings, Graduation parties, Bar Mitzvah's and Bat Mitzvah's, You name it and we can deliver the ideal space for your attendees.
Our clubhouse can provide accommodation for events ranging from 12 people to 200 people.
Capacities
Entire
Clubhouse – 200 guests
Main Dining Room –
100 guests
Center Dining Room –
65 guests
Club Side Dining Room
– 30 guests
Contact us now
to learn more about hosting your event at
Fort Lauderdale Country Club
.
We look forward to seeing you!
Host an Event at FLCC
End Mini-Page 21130

Begin Mini-Page 21065
Fort Lauderdale Country Club offers 36-holes of championship golf, various practice areas and a most welcoming membership. A perfect place to enjoy Florida’s natural environment, to play golf, meet new friends, enjoy an exceptional meal and make new memories.
End Mini-Page 21065
288 acres of forested parkland
5 miles from the Beaches
Two 18-hole golf courses
Begin Mini-Page 21066
End Mini-Page 21066

A History of Longevity and Endurance
The Club’s mission is "To provide our members and their guests with a lifestyle of the highest quality through the traditions of golf.”
Become a Member

Contact Us
Fort Lauderdale Country Club
415 Country Club Circle
Fort Lauderdale, FL 33317
Phone:
954-587-4700
Fax:
954-318-0197
From the East:
Take I-95 to Broward Blvd. Exit Broward Blvd. West. Continue West to the first light past State Road 7/441. This is Country Club Circle/ParkEast/46 Avenue. Turn left. Follow the road as it curves around. The entrance is on the right.
From the West:
Take Broward Blvd. East to Country Club Circle/46th Avenue(the first light after the turnpike overpass when heading east), turn Right. Follow the road as it curves around. The entrance is on the right.
End Mini-Page 21155

Begin Mini-Page 20141
Play when and with whom you want
With two courses it is easy to get a tee time to play on your own or in a group. Organized group play for men and women is available almost every day of the week. A competitive tournament schedule and great social events give our members many reasons to spend time at their home away from home.
Members play when other courses are closed
The two courses at Fort Lauderdale Country Club have the very best drainage after heavy rains. It's not uncommon for our members to be playing very quickly, and certainly before nearby clubs have reopened their courses.
Click below to read about the membership types that interest you:
End Mini-Page 20141
Equity Membership with Voting Rights
Begin Mini-Page 20936
As an Equity member of Fort Lauderdale Country Club, you will be a part owner of the club and have the right and privilege to vote on any referendums and elections brought before the Equity members of the club.
Additionally, you have unlimited golf privileges, use of all practice facilities, access to all dining facilities, banquet rooms, card rooms, lounge and invitation to special events.
No daily greens fees
Seven day advance tee time reservations
Club storage and personal locker with Brass Engraving
Optional unlimited cart usage program, Cart Club
Monthly discounted guest passes
Free clinics from PGA staff in season
Full service Pro shop with Equipment and Apparel at "member prices"
PGA certified golf professionals
All applications are subject to approval by Board of Directors.
Contact Us
or call our Membership Director at 954 318 0157
End Mini-Page 20936
Executive Membership, special program for under 40 year old
Begin Mini-Page 20206
Executive membership is offered to any individual under the age of 40 years old as an affordable pathway to full Equity membership. Modest payments are paid annually enabling the member to become an Equity member without large incremental payment. Executive members enjoy the same access to all facilities as a full equity member, these include the following:
Unlimited golf privileges, use of all practice facilities, access to all dining facilities, banquet rooms, card rooms, lounge and invitation to special events.
No daily greens fees
Three-day advance tee time reservations
Club storage and personal locker
Full service Pro Shop with equipment and apparel at "member prices"
PGA certified golf professionals
All applications are subject to approval by Board of Directors
Contact Us
or call our Membership Director at 954 318 0157
End Mini-Page 20206
Begin Mini-Page 20211
All Members also enjoy privileges for dining and use of the pool at Coral Ridge Yacht Club
located on the Intracoastal Waterway.
“Being a new golfer, I was nervous about joining a private club where everyone would likely play better than me- boy am I glad I joined FLCC! From long time golfers, to the ladies 9 holers who have never broken 100 - everyone here just loves playing and enjoys being out there, meeting new friends, and having fun - being perfect is not required!"
Janet B. 2014
We look forward to meeting you!
Contact Us
End Mini-Page 20211
End Dynamic Page / ID: 388

Begin Mini-Page 21136
Membership
Our Two Golf Courses
Fort Lauderdale Country Club, a hidden gem in South Florida, has always sought perfection dating back to its opening in 1926. That drive, and desire to breathe perfection into the two courses and services happens every day. It starts before the sun comes up and continues until long after it has set. The club is nestled perfectly in an urban city, yet you would never know it because no homes sit on the shoulders of the course.
Both courses, the North and the newly renovated South, offer challenges for players of all levels. With the South renovation completed both courses are distinctly different and challenging in their own ways. Whether you walk or ride the meticulously kept
fairways offer native plantings and beautiful undulations that you would expect
from a premier private course. FLCC welcomes you
to the new state of play in Florida golf.
Play When You Want
Golf is about playing, and at Fort Lauderdale Country Club, with our two courses and 36 holes, you play when you want and as often as you want. If you find yourself wanting to play, but haven’t made a tee time, our two golf courses and five hundred members means it’s easy to just walk on for a tee time.
We also make booking a tee time easy with our
online booking and if you can’t make your tee time that’s also, not a problem. Our courses are not
crowded and pace of play is always under four hours. Play for couples and singles is available almost every day of the week, but with two full courses there is always a tee time to play on your own. This is truly an often-understated benefit!
Diversity
Here at FLCC whether you are a low handicapper,
or a golfer just looking for another lover of the sport to play against, there
are always players looking forward to sharing a few hours of laughter and
friendly competition, everyday. Weekends are most popular, where morning
pick-up games draw young working professionals who gather to golf with other
members.
FLCC is also well-known for the Women’s Golf
Association, one of the largest in South Florida, and in fact the largest in
Broward county. Young and old alike are always welcome. We have several amazing Juniors in our ranks and some that are nationally
rated. So ultimately, our community is all about
golf, friendships and laughter.
Improve Your Game
We get it golf, can be a
challenging sport, but
at Fort Lauderdale Country Club beginners, intermediates and advanced golfers
have a community that is strong in its support of the game. We have multiple golf professionals
with a diversity of teaching styles for all levels of players. Whether someone wants to learn the game of
golf from the ground up, to a scratch golfer who just needs a specialized tune
up, and everything in between, we can create a custom program to accommodate
your state of play. Best of all, our beginner golf group lessons
creates an atmosphere that is very newcomer friendly and the friendships that form
there, can last a lifetime.
At FLCC we also have easy and fun
formats of play with our nine holers introductory league, nine & wine,
twilight golf scramble format. Our practice facilities are top quality. With
our highly ranked driving range, fast putting greens and practice bunkers you
have all the tools to develop your game.
Established in 1926 Fort Lauderdale Country Club's Amenities Include:
Unlimited use of two 18-hole golf courses and practice facilities ( North renovated 2019, South renovated 2024)
Best drainage in Broward County (extremely rare for our courses to close)
Easy access from all major highways & arterial routes
Just 5 miles from downtown Fort Lauderdale
GPS equipped golf carts. Ability to walk the course, push carts available
PGA golf professionals available for private and group lessons
Home of several LPGA professionals and competitive amateur players
Men’s, Ladies’ and Junior golf programs, golf clinics, events and tournaments
The largest Women’s Golf Association in the county
Unlimited use of Clubhouse, including indoor & outdoor dining areas, bars & locker rooms
Ability to host private social and/or business events with no room rental fee
Wine tastings and themed dinners, private wine lockers available
Very friendly membership - always easy to find a game or join a group
Want to play other prestigious courses? Look no further, our members travel every year on sold out arranged trips to enjoy once in a lifetime experiences. Imagine playing Royal Liverpool the week after The Open, our members did! There are trips planned every year for Men, Ladies, and Couples, name a "must play" golf destination worldwide and our members have probably been there! It's a very popular member benefit.
Socially, our members enjoy a beautiful clubhouse with comfortable formal dining, casual inside and outside dining overlooking the courses, and spacious men’s and ladies lounges.  Regular social events give our members many reasons to spend time at their home away from home.
Conveniently located for Fort Lauderdale and Plantation, we have members who live in neighboring South Florida areas and choose to travel a little further to enjoy our unsurpassed facilities.
There is no doubt; a membership at Fort Lauderdale Country Club is an exciting proposition. The camaraderie and social atmosphere is truly like no other private club in Broward County.
You too can experience “the highest quality lifestyle” that is Fort Lauderdale Country Club! The best country club membership available anywhere, just come visit for a no obligation tour.
Click play to explore Fort Lauderdale Country Club
We look forward to meeting you!
End Mini-Page 21136
[if lt IE 9]>

Imagine playing Royal Liverpool the week after The Open, our members did! There are trips planned every year for Men, Ladies, and Couples, name a "must play" golf destination worldwide and our members have probably been there! It's a very popular member benefit.
Socially, our members enjoy a beautiful clubhouse with comfortable formal dining, casual inside and outside dining overlooking the courses, and spacious men’s and ladies lounges.  Regular social events give our members many reasons to spend time at their home away from home.
Conveniently located for Fort Lauderdale and Plantation, we have members who live in neighboring South Florida areas and choose to travel a little further to enjoy our unsurpassed facilities.
There is no doubt; a membership at Fort Lauderdale Country Club is an exciting proposition. The camaraderie and social atmosphere is truly like no other private club in Broward County.
You too can experience “the highest quality lifestyle” that is Fort Lauderdale Country Club! The best country club membership available anywhere, just come visit for a no obligation tour.
Click play to explore Fort Lauderdale Country Club
We look forward to meeting you!

Weddings & Events
The event spaces at Fort Lauderdale Country Club are able to cater to a variety of event
sizes.
Whether you are having a large celebration, corporate meeting or
intimate gathering, our event staff is pleased to accommodate your needs.
Large and small events, Weddings, Anniversaries, Charity events, Birthday celebrations, Retirement parties, Family gatherings, Graduation parties, Bar Mitzvah's and Bat Mitzvah's, You name it and we can deliver the ideal space for your attendees.
Our clubhouse can provide accommodation for events ranging from 12 people to 200 people.
Capacities
Entire
Clubhouse – 200 guests
Main Dining Room –
100 guests
Center Dining Room –
65 guests
Club Side Dining Room
– 30 guests
